title: VM Fitness Hub Backend Data Model
description: This document defines the data structures for User Profiles and their associated Workout Plans stored in Firestore.

userProfile.title: User Profile
userProfile.description: Represents a user's profile data stored in the 'users' collection.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the user account was created.

isAdmin.description: Flag indicating if the user has administrative privileges.

workoutPlan.title: Workout Plan
workoutPlan.description: Represents a workout plan generated by the AI, stored in the 'workoutPlans' subcollection under a user document.

title.description: The title of the workout plan.

summary.description: A brief summary of the plan's focus.

description.description: The workout details for that day.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the plan was created.
